subject: Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F: A Letter of Invitation from the Editorial Board of Mathematics and Computer Science
body:
Mathematics and Computer Science ISSN Online: 2575-6028, ISSN Print: 2575-6036 Current Issue: Vol.4, No.1, 2019 Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F, We are honored to have come across your paper "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We believe that your research field matches with that of Mathematics and Computer Science. The journal's Editorial Board are inviting you to contribute your valuable unpublished research articles to our journal for publication. Suggested Journal List Over 300 journals in our platform are provided for authors to choose covering disciplines like Biochemistry, Biomedical Engineering, Physical Education, Environmental Monitoring, Communication Science, Regional Planning, Traffic, Risk Management, History, Applied Scientific, etc. More details can be found at: http://www.mathcomputer.org/journals American Journal of Mathematical and Computer Modelling American Journal of Computer Science and Technology International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Mathematics American Journal of Applied Mathematics Mathematical Modelling and Applications Prompt Publication Service Efficient Publication Your paper will be published online within 4-6 weeks since the date of submission. Prompt Reply Our fundamental principle is timely feedback about each submission, and every authors' enquiry will be replied promptly. Professional Comments More than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world will carefully review every submitted article. Authors will be provided with various constructive advices from our Professional Reviewers to assist in further improvement of their articles. How to Send your Paper 01 The guidelines and manuscript template for preparing your article can be found at below website: http://www.mathcomputer.org/submission 02 Preparing your manuscript with the guide of the template. 03 Complete registration and upload your manuscript through the submission system. Regards, Gracie Johnson Editorial Office of Mathematics and Computer Science


Mathematics and Computer Science
ISSN Online: 2575-6028, ISSN Print: 2575-6036
Current Issue: Vol.4, No.1, 2019
Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F,
We are honored to have come across your paper "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We believe that your research field matches with that of Mathematics and Computer Science. The journal's Editorial Board are inviting you to contribute your valuable unpublished research articles to our journal for publication.
 
Suggested Journal List
Over 300 journals in our platform are provided for authors to choose covering disciplines like Biochemistry, Biomedical Engineering, Physical Education, Environmental Monitoring, Communication Science, Regional Planning, Traffic, Risk Management, History, Applied Scientific, etc.
More details can be found at: http://www.mathcomputer.org/journals
American Journal of Mathematical and Computer Modelling
American Journal of Computer Science and Technology
International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Mathematics
American Journal of Applied Mathematics
Mathematical Modelling and Applications
 
Prompt Publication Service
Efficient Publication
Your paper will be published online within 4-6 weeks since the date of submission.
Prompt Reply
Our fundamental principle is timely feedback about each submission, and every authors' enquiry will be replied promptly.
Professional Comments
More than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world will carefully review every submitted article. Authors will be provided with various constructive advices from our Professional Reviewers to assist in further improvement of their articles.
 
 
How to Send your Paper
01
The guidelines and manuscript template for preparing your article can be found at below website: http://www.mathcomputer.org/submission
02
Preparing your manuscript with the guide of the template.
03
Complete registration and upload your manuscript through the submission system.
Regards,
Gracie Johnson
Editorial Office of Mathematics and Computer Science
